explanation: The last <BIBL> tag was not closed properly. It was closed after the <TITLE>Prospectus</TITLE> tag, which is a part of the <BIBL> content. The fix was to move the closing </BIBL> tag to the end of the content related to 'Lamberts' hinterlassenen Schriften'.
